bll

Class MenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • bll.MenuItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseProduct, CompositeProduct

    public abstract class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This abstract class is the part of the Composite Design Pattern it is extended by the base product and composite product classes. It is also serializable, to be able to save the data from here
    Author:
    BB
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        the hashcode for the hashSet and hashMap, ow to choose the elements that can be or not part of the list. The menu items differ by name AND price (together)
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        it overrides the equals to be able to compare menuitems by its correct way if there is something different, it returns false, else returns true
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        overrides the toString() function to convert menu items into text nicely
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string which represents the menu item
